welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Monte Porzio Catone, a charming city nestled in the scenic hills of Italy. Known for its rich history, delicious wine, and stunning views, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and immerse yourself in the beauty of Monte Porzio Catone!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ciampino Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Ciampino Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, mostly used for low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Leonardo Da Vinci Airport, dedicated to long-haul international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 6 hours by registering with their email address.
